#summary 演示echo程序
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy,echo

===功能说明===
通过输入服务器输入字符串, 然后经过pipeline中转, 最后由输出服务器输出刚输入的字符串.

===pipeline文件===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<root>
  <meta>
    <property name="athor" value="ether.anima" />
    <property name="age" value="25" />
    <property name="msn" value="isuifengi@hotmail.com" />
  </meta>
  <economy name="main">
    <market name="main">
      <supplier name="main">
        <server name="main">
          <service name="main">
            <pipeline>
              <line>
                <step primarayService="main.main.main.io-server.input" standbyService="">
                  <param-output>
                    <result>
                      <refer-result name="input-data">${response.string-output}</refer-result>
                    </result>
                  </param-output>
                </step>
                <step primarayService="main.main.main.io-server.output" standbyService="">
                  <param-input>
                    <declare>
                      <refer-param name="input-data" />
                    </declare>
                  </param-input>
                </step>
              </line>
            </pipeline>
          </service>
        </server>
        <server name="io-server" host="127.0.0.1">
          <service name="output" port="10001" />
          <service name="input" port="10002" />
        </server>
      </supplier>
    </market>
  </economy>
</root>
}}}

===说明===

===步骤===
很明显这里包含两个个步骤
  # 由输入服务器输入内容
  # pipeline中转
  # 由输出服务器输出内容
在代码中的体现
  * 输入
{{{
<step primarayService="main.main.main.io-server.input" standbyService="">
  <param-output>
    <result>
      <refer-result name="input-data">${response.string-output}</refer-result>
    </result>
  </param-output>
</step>
}}}
  * 中转
{{{
name="input-data"
}}}
  * 输出
{{{
<step primarayService="main.main.main.io-server.output" standbyService="">
  <param-input>
    <declare>
      <refer-param name="input-data" />
    </declare>
  </param-input>
</step>
}}}

===远程服务声明===

{{{
<server name="io-server" host="127.0.0.1">
  <service name="output" port="10001" />
  <service name="input" port="10002" />
</server>
}}}
